paper_abstract: This paper presents a simple proof that shows that the quorum failure detector class (denoted Sigma) is the weakest failure detector class required to implement all atomic read/write register in all asynchronous message-passing system prone to all arbitrary number of process crashes. This proof is based on a new reduction algorithm ill which all the variables are bounded. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A simple proof of the necessity of the failure detector Sigma to implement an atomic register in asynchronous message-passing systems
